Node.definition: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= man; ► prophet (נָבִיא) ◄ son of Berechiah, son of Iddo
aramaism: = direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► grandfather of Zechariah (זְכַרְיָה) prophet (נָבִיא)
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= member of tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) inhabitant of the kingdom of Judah; after the exile referring to all descendants of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
territory of tribe of Judah
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= referent pointing to a point in time, usually in reference to another event
aramaism: = direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Jehoiachin (יְהֹויָכִין) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► father of Zerubbabel (זְרֻבָּבֶל)
= man; ◄ son of Jozadak (יֹוצָדָק) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► high priest (כֹּהֵן) after exile
aramaism: = direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Seraiah (שְׂרָיָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► father of Jeshua (יֵשׁוּעַ) high priest (כֹּהֵן) time of exile
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= to move to a certain location, seen from that location's perspective
= man; ► governor of the province west of the Euphrates (פְּרָת) during the Persian empire
= region on the other side, situated across a stream, or the sea
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia
= fellow member of the same group of people, sharing a bond of employment or a common purpose

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to happen ◄ as if it were an object placed in a certain position
= an official statement that obliges people to behave according to its rules or directives
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= causative process by which humans bring a building project to completion
meaning unsure; possibly: = constructions surrounding a house, including its fence, surrounding annexes, etc.
= referent pointing to a point in time, usually in reference to another event

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= a referent to a group of male (and female) participants, or to multiple objects or events of masculine gender
= a male human
= type of construction
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= a council or a group of older men who act with authority on behalf of or over their people; some represent an entire nation, others manage the affairs at the town level; some provide their leader with counsel; involved in both judicial and military decisions, and participating in cultic ceremonies; ≈ expected to be wise and considered worthy of deference and respect
= member of tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) inhabitant of the kingdom of Judah; after the exile referring to all descendants of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to cause (someone or some activity) to stop
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans cause other humans no longer to be engaged in an action that they were engaged in previously
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= information about a certain matter, either in an oral or written format
= man; ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) in post exilic times
= process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another
= referent pointing to a point in time, usually in reference to another event
= written document; ► composed by a government official and used to communicate instructions or information to other people
= causative action by which humans or deities send an object to (other) humans, usually through the mediation of a messenger
= man; ► governor of the province west of the Euphrates (פְּרָת) during the Persian empire
= region on the other side, situated across a stream, or the sea
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia
= fellow member of the same group of people, sharing a bond of employment or a common purpose
= person of authority in the Persian empire
= region on the other side, situated across a stream, or the sea
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia
= man; ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) in post exilic times
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= causative action by which humans or deities send an object to (other) humans, usually through the mediation of a messenger
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= a reference to a location in a written document
= man; ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) in post exilic times
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= to leave a certain place
territory of tribe of Judah
= an adminstrative division of a country or a city

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which deities, humans, or towns have a high status or authority
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= block of stone, whether fully square or not;◄ found in nature or hewn from a quarry; ► used for building houses, walls, and other constructions
= large stone that was cut square ► so that it could be laid one on other stones to form a wall or building; ≈ associated with wealth and heaviness
= a single piece of wood taken from a tree, cut and finished, and used for building and construction

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place
= flat vertical construction, ◄ made of stone, sometimes with wooden supports, ► used as a divider of spaces, or to enclose a space
= state in which an activity is carried out without unnecessary delay
= action by which a person or an object is successful, completing a task or purpose according to the intended outcome
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects, people or activities
= referent pointing to a point in time, usually in reference to another event

= a council or a group of older men who act with authority on behalf of or over their people; some represent an entire nation, others manage the affairs at the town level; some provide their leader with counsel; involved in both judicial and military decisions, and participating in cultic ceremonies; ≈ expected to be wise and considered worthy of deference and respect
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to happen ◄ as if it were an object placed in a certain position
= an official statement that obliges people to behave according to its rules or directives
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= causative process by which humans bring a building project to completion
meaning unsure; possibly: = constructions surrounding a house, including its fence, surrounding annexes, etc.

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it

Node.gloss: to make known|to show|to inform|to tell|to teach
Node.definition: = causative process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire information about (other) humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= causative action by which humans write down names or other information for record keeping purposes, without an explicit reference to a scroll or other writing materials
= a male human

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse, including those associated to him or her

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= state in which objects or events are many in number or frequency
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

= causative action by which humans provoke deities to anger
= indirect male progenitor

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

Node.gloss: to hand over|to deliver in the hands (of someone else)
